headline: MetLife Broadens Upwise Reach Through Nayya and Workday Deal
summary: Taking Nayya's help, MET expands the reach of its Upwise platform by making it available via the Workday Marketplace. This is expected to boost uptake of Employee Benefit plans.

raw.headline: MetLife Broadens Upwise Reach Through Nayya and Workday Deal
raw.summary: Taking Nayya's help, MET expands the reach of its Upwise platform by making it available via the Workday Marketplace. This is expected to boost uptake of Employee Benefit plans.

headline: Workday VNDLY Named a Leader in Everest Group's Vendor Management Systems (VMS) PEAK Matrix速 Assessment 2025
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced that Workday VNDLY was named a Leader and Star Performer in Everest Group's Vendor Management Systems (VMS) PEAK Matrix速 Assessment 2025. This is the fifth consecutive year that Workday VNDLY has been recognized as a Leader. A complimentary copy of the report is available here.

headline: HR Path Expands U.S. Footprint with Acquisition of ClearCourse Consulting
summary: HR Path, a global leader in HR consulting and HRIS solutions, is pleased to announce the strategic acquisition of ClearCourse Consulting, a U.S.-based firm specializing in HCM consulting for platforms including Dayforce, ADP, UKG, and Workday.

raw.headline: HR Path Expands U.S. Footprint with Acquisition of ClearCourse Consulting

headline: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Calamos Phineus Long/Short Fund rose 0.93% in Q1 (Class I shares at NAV), compared with a price decline of -4.27% for the S&P 500 Index and loss of -2.15% for the MSCI World Index.

headline: Workday: Still Positive On Growth Acceleration In The Coming Years
summary: Workday's AI-driven growth surges with ACV doubling YoY, boosted by a thriving partner ecosystem and Workday GO's launch. Read why my rating for WDAY is a buy.
